label: Anti-social media app
title: Myxine
uaqs_summary: Do social media leave you cold? Do you dislike Facebook friend requests and offers to connect to Linkedin networks? Several UADigital developers share your feelings, and will soon release Myxine, the World's first anti-social media application. Following the trend seen in an events app for University of Arizona students, which used a narwhal as its logo, it is named after a sea creature. In Myxine the only available responses to a request for contact are Disregard, Ignore, Shun and Slime. If you're an isolated introvert, this app's for you!
